titleStmt.title: Proposals for a water-tax, yearly to be raised to make good the funds; / humbly offered to the honourable House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Saer, Richard.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Richard Saer, late of His Majesty's Horse-guard.
Reproduction of original in the Sutro Library.
